summary: "Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse" is a 2018 animated superhero movie about Miles Morales, the new Spider-Man. He teams up with Spider-Heroes from different universes to save New York from the Kingpin. The film was the first in the Spider-Verse franchise and won an Academy Award for Best Animated Feature. It was praised for its unique style, blending computer and hand-drawn animation. A sequel, "Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse," came out in 2023, and a third film is being made.
title: Spider-Man Into the Spider-Verse
